price: 77 sachez que je les désavoue, adorant uniquement le Seigneur de la Création,
arabic: فَإِنَّهُمۡ عَدُوّٞ لِّيٓ إِلَّا رَبَّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: fa-innahum ʿaduwwun lī illā rabba al-ʿālamīna
